tips.title: Tips for a Great Job Post
tips.tip1: Be specific about what you need and any requirements
tips.tip2: Include photos to help taskers understand the job better
tips.tip3: Set a realistic budget based on market rates
tips.tip4: Be flexible with timing to get more applications

walletRefund.title: Request Wallet Refund
walletRefund.description: Request a refund from your wallet balance

instructions.title: Next Steps
instructions.step1: Use the reference code above for your bank transfer
instructions.step2: Complete the bank transfer with the specified amount
instructions.step3: Click 'Confirm Payment' and upload your receipt

walletRefund.instructionsText:
1. Use the reference code above for your bank transfer
2. Complete the bank transfer with the specified amount
3. After transfer, click 'Confirm Payment' and upload your receipt
4. Send the receipt via WhatsApp to the admin
5. Wait for admin verification and approval

hero.description: Ready to earn money doing what you love? Join ManzelHelp as a helper and connect with people who need your expertise.
hero.descriptionBold: Whether you clean, fix, tutor, or assist in any way, you can make a difference and get paid for it!

hero.title: Help Center
hero.description: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner, fill in your details, and verify your email address.

helperVsCustomer.question: What's the difference between a Helper and Customer?
helperVsCustomer.answer: Helpers offer services to others, while Customers book services. You can be both on the same account.

completeProfile.question: How do I complete my profile?
completeProfile.answer: Go to your profile page and add your skills, experience, photos, and availability to attract more clients.

howPaymentsWork.question: How do payments work?
howPaymentsWork.answer: Payments are processed securely through our platform. Customers pay upfront, and Helpers receive payment after service completion.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers in supported regions.

whenGetPaid.question: When do I get paid?
whenGetPaid.answer: Helpers receive payment within 2-3 business days after the customer confirms service completion.

verifyHelpers.question: How do you verify Helpers?
verifyHelpers.answer: All Helpers undergo background checks, identity verification, and skill assessments before joining our platform.

notSatisfied.question: What if I'm not satisfied with a service?
notSatisfied.answer: Contact our support team within 24 hours. We'll work with you to resolve the issue or provide a refund.

personalInfoSafe.question: Is my personal information safe?
personalInfoSafe.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. Read our Privacy Policy for details.

safetyTips.title: Safety Tips
safetyTips.description: Stay safe while using our platform

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include:

items.nameContact: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
items.communications: Communications with us and other users

usageInformation.title: Usage Information
usageInformation.description: We automatically collect certain information about your use of our services, including:

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.provideServices: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.processTransactions: Process transactions and send related information
items.sendNotices: Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
items.respondComments: Respond to your comments and questions
items.monitorAnalyze: Monitor and analyze trends and usage
items.ensureSafety: Ensure safety and security on our platform

informationSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.withUsers: With other users as necessary to provide our services
items.withProviders: With service providers who assist us in operating our platform
items.requiredByLaw: When required by law or to protect our rights
items.businessTransfer: In connection with a business transfer or acquisition
items.withConsent: With your consent or at your direction

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights
yourRights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:

items.accessUpdate: Access and update your personal information
items.deleteAccount: Delete your account and associated data
items.requestCopy: Request a copy of your data

cookiesTracking.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookiesTracking.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our services.

childrenPrivacy.title: 7. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.

changesToPolicy.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contactUs.title: 9. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.description: By accessing and using ManzelHelp ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

descriptionOfService.title: 2. Description of Service
descriptionOfService.description: ManzelHelp is a platform that connects service providers ("Helpers") with customers seeking various services. We facilitate the connection but are not a party to the actual service agreements between users.

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.description: To use our service, you must:

items.maintainSecurity: Maintain the security of your account
items.ageRequirement: Be at least 18 years old (or have parental consent)
items.complyLaws: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

items.lawfulPurposes: Use the service only for lawful purposes
items.notInterfere: Not interfere with or disrupt the service
items.notImpersonate: Not impersonate any person or entity
items.respectUsers: Respect other users and maintain professional conduct
items.accurateServiceInfo: Provide accurate information about services and pricing
items.completeServices: Complete agreed-upon services in a timely manner

items.falseInfo: Posting false, misleading, or fraudulent information
items.circumventPayment: Attempting to circumvent our payment system

paymentTerms.title: 6. Payment Terms
paymentTerms.description: Payment processing is handled through secure third-party providers. Users agree to:

items.payFees: Pay all fees and charges as described
items.finalSales: Understand that all sales are final unless otherwise specified

disputeResolution.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: In case of disputes between users, we encourage direct communication and resolution. ManzelHelp may assist in dispute resolution but is not responsible for the outcome of service agreements between users.

limitationOfLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: ManzelHelp acts as a platform connecting users and is not responsible for:

items.serviceQuality: The quality or outcome of services provided

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The ManzelHelp platform, including its design, functionality, and content, is protected by intellectual property laws. Users retain rights to their own content but grant us a license to use it in connection with our services.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts that violate these terms. Users may also terminate their accounts at any time. Upon termination, certain provisions of these terms will continue to apply.

changesToTerms.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.description: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. We will notify users of significant changes through the platform or email.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of [Your Jurisdiction].

contactInformation.title: 13. Contact Information
contactInformation.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
